review: It was great pleasure meeting Dr.Girish Godbole ,I had some issues with my heart, he started explaining the actual problem in me, like gospel truth he pointed out every single issues and made me to understand so clear that the problem is not in my heart,but its WITHIN me. Such a great personality, and it's such a pleasure listening to him , the agony I was going through, he made to vanish from my heart. With his speech, I regained my will power and left his cabin as a new man. It's very seldom to find such great person in this present world. May god bless and give him good health.          John Bosco

Dr Girish Godbole ** ** ********* ************ *** is able to explain the patient's medical problems in simple terms. He willingly clears all the doubts of patient and ready to suggest alternative practical solutions. I would definitely recommend him to my family and friends.l

An amazing cardiologist who takes time to explain in detail what is happening in your body and how you need to respond to it. Not in a hurry at all even during these Covid times to send you off without a proper diagnosis and without making you feel confident that you are in good hands. I went to the doctor with high BP and high pulse rate and anxiety related issues, left his room feeling so good and so positive. ** *********** ************** *** *********** A truly amazing doctor. Will recommend to anyone who is looking for a great Cardiologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: one word - best cardiologist in Bangalore who is very friendly, listens carefully and treats with utmost care.

Very bad experience with Dr. Girish Godbole. He was very unprofessional. His attitude towards the patient who is need of his help was horrible. He was not approachable and people friendly. He did not have the patience to listen to the problem and "insisted" the patient listens to him before even stating her problem. Does not exhibit humility and empathy. Absolutely no point of a consultation. At the end of the consultation, we have no solution to the problem. ****** ***** ** **** * **** ***** **** ***** ******* *** ***** ** **** *** *** ******** *** ***** *** ** *** *** ******* ********* ***** *** ********* ** **** ***** ** *** ** ********* *** ***** ******* ** ** ************* ** ******* * ******** *** *** ***** ** *** *** ** *** *************

review: Girish sir is one stop destination  for Confidence, Courage & Conviction  in your life. Best doctor available in the city who strengthens your will power through his pragmatic approach.  Rarest gift in the profession & Pride of Vikram hospital

For me, Dr Godbole is God as the name it self speaks. I was 100% sure for my 2nd Life as he put me in comfortable one to one conversation before Pacemaker being planned to be inplanted.  So professional and Kudos to the entire team of his. Vikram Hospital is lucky to have such an out standing Professional Doctor. 
Strongly recommend for any one to meet him for any Cardiovascular problems. 
Colonel  K S Raju,  A Veteran from Corps of Engineers. INDIAN ARMY

*** ********* *** **** ********* *** ***** I visited my grandmother's lung issue. Doctor prescribed medicines that were helpful. There was a waiting time to consult the doctor when more patients were there. I would like to suggest this doctor to others and I would like to give a rating of 4/5 and we are satisfied with the treatment.

I have been consulting this doctor for almost 8 years. I am satisfied with the doctor and doctor treatment. Doctor listened to our problem and suggested medications very well. When it comes to improvement everything was good and most of my relatives and friends are already consulting this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Consulted for my mother's health and the doctor rushed to the clinic in the late night to perform the procedure. I am grately thankful for the doctor for attending to my mother in the late midnight and saving her.
